verses.verse: A <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but a <S%H8003>just<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%> is his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.
When <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%>, then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H7036>shame<s%>: but with the <S%H6800>lowly<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
The <S%H8538>integrity<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5148>guide<s%> <S%H5558>them<s%>: but the perverseness of <S%H898>transgressors<s%> shall destroy <S%H7703>them<s%>.
<S%H1952>Riches<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> not in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: but <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> shall <S%H3474>direct<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>: but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his own <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>.
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H898>them<s%>: but transgressors shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their own <S%H1942>naughtiness<s%>.
When a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4194>dies<s%>, his <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>: and the <S%H8431>hope<s%> of <S%H205>unjust<s%> men <S%H6>perishes<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is delivered <S%H2502>out<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> comes in his <S%H935>place<s%>.
An <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: but through <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall the <S%H6662>just<s%> be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>.
When it goes <S%H2898>well<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, the <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H5970>rejoices<s%>: and when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, there are shouts of <S%H7440>joy<s%>.
By the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> the <S%H7176>city<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%>: but it is <S%H2040>overthrown<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
He that is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> holds his <S%H2790>peace<s%>.
A <S%H1980>talebearer<s%> <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H5475>secrets<s%>: but he that is of a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>.
Where no <S%H8458>counsel<s%> <S%H5971>is<s%>, the people <S%H5307>fall<s%>: but in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> there is <S%H8668>safety<s%>.
He that is <S%H6148>collateral<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall <S%H7321>smart<s%> for <S%H8130>it<s%>: and he that refuses <S%H8628>collateral<s%> is <S%H982>secure<s%>.
A <S%H2580>gracious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8551>retains<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%>: and <S%H6184>strong<s%> men <S%H8551>retain<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>.
The <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> does <S%H1580>good<s%> to his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>: but he that is <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H7607>flesh<s%>.

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6213>works<s%> a <S%H8267>deceitful<s%> <S%H6468>work<s%>: but to him that <S%H2232>sows<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> there shall be a <S%H571>sure<s%> <S%H7938>reward<s%>.
As <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> tends to <S%H2416>life<s%>: so he that <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> pursues it to his own <S%H4194>death<s%>.

They that are of a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but such as are <S%H8549>upright<s%> in their <S%H1870>way<s%> are his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.

Though <S%H3027>hand<s%> join in <S%H3027>hand<s%>, the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>: but the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>.
As a <S%H5141>jewel<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in a <S%H2386>swine<s%>'s <S%H639>snout<s%>, so is a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> which is <S%H5493>without<s%> <S%H2940>discretion<s%>.
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is only <S%H2896>good<s%>: but the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> that <S%H6340>scatters<s%>, and yet <S%H3254>increases<s%>; and there is that <S%H2820>withholds<s%> more than is <S%H3476>meet<s%>, but it tends to <S%H4270>poverty<s%>.
The <S%H1293>liberal<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be made <S%H1878>fat<s%>: and he that <S%H7301>waters<s%> shall be watered also <S%H3384>himself<s%>.

He that <S%H4513>withholds<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%>, the <S%H3816>people<s%> shall <S%H5344>curse<s%> <S%H1293>him<s%>: but blessing shall be upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that sells <S%H7666>it<s%>.
He that diligently <S%H7836>seeks<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1245>procures<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%>: but he that <S%H1875>seeks<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%>, it shall come unto <S%H935>him<s%>.
He that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in his <S%H6239>riches<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>: but the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> as a <S%H5929>branch<s%>.

He that <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>: and the <S%H191>fool<s%> shall be <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; and he that <S%H3947>wins<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%>.
<S%H6662>Behold<s%>, the righteous shall be <S%H7999>recompensed<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: much more the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H2398>sinner<s%>.
